  JOYSTICK_NONE,
  JOYSTICK_LEFT,
  JOYSTICK_RIGHT,
  JOYSTICK_UP,
  JOYSTICK_DOWN,
  JOYSTICK_PUSH
}

Detailed Description

The header file describes the joystick interface.

Function Documentation

result_t BSP_OpenJoystick ( void(*)(BSP_JoystickState_t state)  generalHandler)

Opens component and registers handler for joystick events.

Parameters:
[in]generalHandler -the joystick handler; can be set to NULL
[in]state -joystick state 
Returns:
BC_FAIL - joystick module is busy,
BC_SUCCESS - joystick module is free.
result_t BSP_CloseJoystick ( void  )

closes joystick component.

Returns:
BC_FAIL - joystick module was not opened,
BC_SUCCESS - joystick module was closed.
BSP_JoystickState_t BSP_ReadJoystickState ( void  )

Reads state of joystick.

Returns:
  Joystick state.
